Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

CETEARYL OLIVATE, SORBITAN OLIVATE, ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL, SODIUM PCA, ALLANTOIN, ISOHEXADECANE, CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE, POLYSORBATE 60, PHENOXYETHANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE
